summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Tenth Avenue Northeast, from Sylvester Place to East Sixty-fifth Street and Sylvester Place, from Tenth Avenue Northeast to Twelfth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water-mains therein, of proper dimensions and material, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2224 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
